name: RetrieveGiftCard
description:
Retrieve a gift card using its account number.

This tool retrieves details of a gift card by using the gift card account number (GAN). It should be called when you need to access information about a specific gift card.

parameters.name: gift_card_account_number
parameters.description: The account number (GAN) of the gift card to retrieve. Max length 255 digits; Square-issued GANs have 16 digits.

value_schema.description:
The gift card account number (GAN) of the gift card to retrieve.
The maximum length of a GAN is 255 digits to account for third-party GANs that have been imported.
Square-issued gift cards have 16-digit GANs.
